"Codotta Idetta Subjugation":
"We've confirmed the existence of a
powerful Darker in the Kuron region of
planet Harkotan, the Codotta Idetta.
We cannot let the Kuronites join with this
Darker to invade Shironia.

Available ARKS are to sortie immediately
and subdue the Codotta Idetta.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Be defeated in the final area."
